attributes.additional_details: Im starting this petition because as a mother of 2 young children I am sick to tears about children being tortured abused and murdered by mothers, fathers, partners, teenagers, babysitters and anyone else that thinks its their god given right to do what ever they want to innocent children and not getting what they deserve which is LIFE in prison and not segregated off for protection but mixed with every other criminal in there! The children they harmed didnt have a chance of and protection so why should they? SIGN MY PETITION and give these poor children justice.
